channel.title: Dragon Claws Special
channel.description:
I am using a deltascape source. (Fuzion-pkz source)
I have working dragon claws but the special attack doesn't work. When I wield them it shows a special attack but when I click it, it glows like normal then stops right before it hits and doesn't spec.
I did the case 8002: in special.java
Anyone know why it doesn't work?

item.title: Dragon Claws Special

@Clawz_fury wrote:

USE DA SEARCH BAR http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,444838.msg3266204.html#msg3266204
